name: Urban Ed Academy
description: To provide adequate educational enrichment, family support, and advocacy for struggling communities of color. Urban Ed Academy aims to use a holistic approach to help students and their families succeed academically, improve social conditions, and well-being to become productive citizens of their community.
fullDescription: To provide adequate educational enrichment, family support, and advocacy for struggling communities of color. Urban Ed Academy aims to use a holistic approach to help students and their families succeed academically, improve social conditions, and well-being to become productive citizens of their community.
whatTheyOffer: Building equity in education through representative leadership in and around school. The fellowship aims to give every Black student at least one Black male teacher before the 6th grade, thereby drastically affecting academic outcomes for Black students and societal outcomes for all students.
